Suggested Zakat Charities

Here are some charities you can support with your Zakat Giving

Al-Khair Foundation

Established in 2003, we actively work in the fields of education, community cohesion and international relief work.

Registered charity number: 1126808

HHUGS - Helping Households Under Great Stress

HHUGS provides practical support and advice to households devastated by the arrest of a family member under UK anti-terror legislation.

Registered charity number: 1117924

Hand In Hand For Syria

We have been at the forefront of humanitarian aid in Syria since the conflict began. We work inside Syria, so your gifts will go straight to the people in most desperate need.

Registered charity number: 1145862
